title: PIC2ALERT
summary: An alert display app for smart watches
description: This is a Pictorial presentation of alerts in smart watch to help people who normally forgets daily routines of taking medicines or others. This solution has a desktop part called configurator. Through configurator you can create a configuration file of alerts with pictures and upload it to this application. Uploading each configuration will reset this smart watch application.
descriptionHTML: This is a Pictorial presentation of alerts in smart watch to help people who normally forgets daily routines of taking medicines or others. This solution has a desktop part called configurator. Through configurator you can create a configuration file of alerts with pictures and upload it to this application. Uploading each configuration will reset this smart watch application.
comments: Not user friendly I like the idea, but never could figure out how to use it. Changes the watch face and it didn't seem to allow me to change it to another face.
recentChanges: - Pictures are now auto synced with client devices with device id
- added Companion App and DataLayer Sync with Watch
